resources.string: To the most convenient app in the world! In the Tool Master app you will find these tools: Todo, Timer and Flashlight. And all of this just in one single app!

Tool Master is your all-in-one solution for daily tasks. With a built-in Todo list for organizing tasks, a Timer to keep track of time, and a Flashlight for quick access to light in dark environments, Tool Master brings convenience to your fingertipsâ€”all within a single, easy-to-use app!
